Clients often ask me for recommendations on hotels and venues to celebrate their events in Spain, especially those from #northEurope who are looking for mild temperatures during the winter months, delicious food, and a high standard of service. Luckily, Spain offers a lot of great spaces to choose from. However, the choice of venue depends on the objective of the event, the target audience, the message you want to convey, and the change in behavior you want to achieve at the end of the attendee journey. For instance, if you want to align your employees around innovation and the future, choosing a typical, classical, or not renovated space would not be credible, right? I am not into promoting spaces, but this hotel ticks all the boxes, and offers indulgent quality and a great customer journey making it an excellent choice for MICE events and special meetings.
